com.unibeta.vrules.base

Class vRules4j

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unibeta.vrules.base.vRules4j

  • public class vRules4j
extends java.lang.Object
    vRules4j rules definition object which can be serialized to xml payload. It can be serialized to xml directly by JAXB in vRules4j syntax.
    Author:
    jordan.xue
    See Also:
    com.unibeta.vrules.tools.Java2vRules.toXml(vRules4j, String);
